mapper.select: select ao.tag_id, t.name, ao.zero_value, ao.max_value , ao.hist_type_code, ao.percent, ao.slope, ao.scan_value , ao.scan_time, ao.prev_value, ao.prev_time, ao.last_hist_value , ao.last_hist_time, ao.unit_id, x.float_value , coalesce(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(x.scan_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ao.last_hist_time), 0) int_since_lhs , coalesce(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,ao.last_hist_time,x.scan_time),0) int_scan_time , x.updated, x.scan_time pmc_scan_time, x.float_value from analog_output ao join tag t on ao.tag_id = t.id join tag_type tt on tt.code = t.tag_type_code join xfer x on t.id = x.id where t.active = 'Y' order by 2

select ao.tag_id, t.id, t.name, t.description, t.c1_lat, t.c1_long, t.c2_lat, t.c2_long , t.tag_type_code, t.active, ao.zero_value, ao.max_value, ao.hist_type_code , ao.scan_value, ao.scan_time, ao.prev_value, ao.unit_id , ao.prev_time, ao.last_hist_value, ao.last_hist_time , tt.id tag_type_id, u.code from analog_output ao join tag t on ao.tag_id = t.id join tag_type tt on tt.code = t.tag_type_code join unit u on ao.unit_id = u.id order by 3

select ao.tag_id, t.id, t.name, t.description, t.c1_lat, t.c1_long, t.c2_lat, t.c2_long , t.tag_type_code, t.active, ao.zero_value, ao.max_value, ao.hist_type_code , ao.scan_value, ao.scan_time, ao.prev_value, ao.unit_id , ao.prev_time, ao.last_hist_value, ao.last_hist_time , tt.id tag_type_id, u.code from analog_output ao join tag t on ao.tag_id = t.id join tag_type tt on tt.code = t.tag_type_code join unit u on ao.unit_id = u.id where coalesce(ao.is_new,0) != 0 order by 3

select ao.tag_id, t.id, t.name, t.description, t.c1_lat, t.c1_long, t.c2_lat, t.c2_long , t.tag_type_code, t.active, ao.zero_value, ao.max_value, ao.hist_type_code , ao.scan_value, ao.scan_time, ao.prev_value, ao.unit_id , ao.prev_time, ao.last_hist_value, ao.last_hist_time , tt.id tag_type_id, u.code from analog_output ao join tag t on ao.tag_id = t.id join tag_type tt on tt.code = t.tag_type_code join unit u on ao.unit_id = u.id where t.id = #{parm1}
mapper.insert: insert analog_output ( tag_id, zero_value, max_value, is_new , hist_type_code, percent, slope, scan_value, scan_time , prev_value, prev_time, last_hist_value, last_hist_time , unit_id ) values( #{tagId}, #{zeroValue}, #{maxValue}, 0 , #{histTypeCode}, #{percent}, null, null, null , null, null, null, null, #{unitId} )
